Uses of Interface
edu.biu.scapi.circuits.encryption.MultiKeyEncryptionScheme

Packages that use MultiKeyEncryptionScheme
edu.biu.scapi.circuits.encryption

Uses of MultiKeyEncryptionScheme in edu.biu.scapi.circuits.encryption
 

Classes in edu.biu.scapi.circuits.encryption that implement MultiKeyEncryptionScheme
 class AES128MultiKeyEncryption
          This is a semi-classical double encryption scheme in which we use a PRF (here, we use AES) twice on each value with different keys to double encrypt.
 class AESFixedKeyMultiKeyEncryption
          This encryption scheme uses AES with a fixed key and thus has the benefit of not needing to repeatedly perform the costly setKey procedure for AES.
 class HashingMultiKeyEncryption
          We implement this double encryption scheme using Hashing.
 

Uses of MultiKeyEncryptionScheme in edu.biu.scapi.circuits.garbledCircuit
 

Constructors in edu.biu.scapi.circuits.garbledCircuit with parameters of type MultiKeyEncryptionScheme
FreeXORGarblingParameters(BooleanCircuit ungarbledCircuit, MultiKeyEncryptionScheme mes, boolean isRowReduction)
          This constructor creates a garbling parameters' object for a regular representation of FreeXORGarbledBooleanCircuit.
GarbledBooleanCircuitExtendedImp(GarbledBooleanCircuit gbc, MultiKeyEncryptionScheme mes)
          This constructor should be used in case the garbling is done using a MultiKeyEncryptionScheme.
GarbledBooleanCircuitExtendedImp(GarbledBooleanCircuit gbc, MultiKeyEncryptionScheme mes, PseudorandomGenerator prg)
          This constructor should be used in case the garbling is done using a PRG and seed.
StandardGarblingParameters(BooleanCircuit ungarbledCircuit, MultiKeyEncryptionScheme mes, java.security.SecureRandom random, boolean isRowReduction)
          This constructor creates a garbling parameters' object for a regular representation of StandardGarbledBooleanCircuit.
